name: Elements - Card Game
description:
Choose a deck and fight with the elements!

  • Fight against a bot who will try to defeat you.
  • Manage your mana usage and available cards.
  • Win by destoying all of the opponent's shields.
WHAT IS ELEMENTS?

Elements is a small, single-player card game, where you can choose a deck which represents one of three elements: Fire, Earth and Water.  Each element has its own spell which can turn the tide in difficult situations. Think forward. Always.

DEVELOPMENT

We made this game in one week for a nation-wide Android game development competition. With this and some other projects we won the first place in 2019. The game has been expanded with an online multiplayer mode for one of our member's degree work.
